title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry bacon. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all together with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate and grill chicken. Cook tomato sauce with cream and spices. Combine with chicken and simmer.
